DataListSpec.Name: Get Child List For Photo API Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Gets a list of child photo data for annual photo Web API program.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_GETLISTOFCHILDDATA_PHOTOAPI( @CHILDIDLIST xml ) as set nocount on;
select --replace(ISNULL(sc.[FIRSTNAME], '') + ISNULL(sc.[MIDDLENAME], '') + ISNULL(sc.[LASTNAME], ''), ' ', '') as CHILDNAME, rtrim(replace(sc.[NAME], ' ','')) as CHILDNAME, so.LOOKUPID as CHILDID, sl.LOOKUPID as LOCATIONID, sc.[NAME] as CRMNAME, sc.[FIRSTNAME] as FIRSTNAME, sc.[LASTNAME] as LASTNAME from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD sc join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so ON so.ID = sc.ID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION sl ON sl.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID where so.LOOKUPID IN (select CHILDLOOKUPID from dbo.USR_UFN_GETCHILDLOOKUPIDLIST_FROM_ITEMSXML(@CHILDIDLIST)) order by so.LOOKUPID;
